claims.object: Understanding of how physiological systems interact
Considering the human organism as an integrated network

surface_layer.definition: A field that aims to advance our understanding of how physiological systems and sub-systems interact.

deep_layer.mechanism: Analyzes the interactions between organs and systems as a complex network.
deep_layer.origin: Emerges from the need to understand complex physiological interactions.

epistemic_metadata.source: The Human Organism as an Integrated Interaction Network ...
